text: Wendy Richard born Wendy Emerton, (20 July 1943 â€“ 26 February 2009) was a British actress. She is best known for her roles as Miss Brahms in Are You Being Served? and as Pauline Fowler in EastEnders. She was born in Middlesbrough, North Riding of Yorkshire. She lived in London for most of her life. She died of metastatic breast cancer there. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Middlesbrough
